name: Stumble Home 3D
description:
A 3D Version of my Global Game Jam 2019 game. Stumble Home is all about coming home after a night out and trying not to wake up your parents. Wandering into objects will create noise and eventually, if you're too loud, you will wake up your parents and lose.

Watch out for your sibling too, she likes to get drinks of water in the night and is alwas looking to get money out of a situation if she can.
